Estimate Trend — est_trend
text: function estimates trend life expectancy moving window.

title: Estimate Trend — est_trend
text: input_vec numeric vector life expectancies across different years. year_vec numeric vector years observed. Default 1960:2020, window_val numeric giving length window. Default 10.
